page.title: 20Traffic Census
page.content: On Monday 15th July 1985 we did a Traffic Census.We did the Motorway (M.50),the cross roads and the lane which goes past our school.We started from 11.45-12.10am.On the Motorway the were 253 cars,151 lorries,6 caravans,2 coaches and 1 horse box.On the roads there were 28 cars,4 lorries and 1 bicycle.On the lane past Pendock School there were only 7 cars,3 tractors,1 lorry and one bicycle.If we went to the Motorway on a Saturday we would probably find more vehicles because it is a sort of holiday,the same with the other two roads. There are less cars on the lane past the school,because there aren't many houses and it isn't an important road.The only time when there are a lot of cars is when people pick children up from school or when someone's having a party.
